title: America's K-shaped economy has turned restaurant winners and losers upside down
full_text: America's K-shaped economy has turned restaurant winners and losers upside down. Usually, fast-food consumption is a reliable recession indicator, but in a K-shaped economy, the old playbook has broken down, analysts say.. Clark stays away from foods made with refined white flour, and lots of added sugar.monticelllo/Getty Images <ul><li>Fast food's recession playbook is breaking as deals fail to lure pressured consume… [+5286 chars]
